I've never written a review for anything. But I feel that I have to for Erno Laszlo. I've had hormonal acne for about 5 years and struggled with finding something that would help with breakouts while keeping my skin hydrated. This Phelityl cleansing bar along with the pre-cleansing oil is amazing. I first massage the oil onto my face while I run hot water in the skin. Then I wet the soap and rub all over my face. I create a lather and massage for a minute or two. When rinsing it's important to do the splashing technique for 30 splashes with the treatment water (oil and soap water) and then 10 splashes of running hot water. I then follow up with the light controlling lotion (which seems like it would dry your skin but doesn't). After that I put on the hydra serum and then night cream. This routine morning and night along with monthly facials with steam and extraction, as well as a healthy diet has really helped me out. I do break out but at a fraction of what I used to get. I highly recommend this!!
